text: And out the deceased came! Bound hand and foot with bandages,He must have come jumping out like a kangaroo—with his feet tied he could not walk. It must have been an interesting sight. And with his eyes covered he could not see, so obviously he had supernatural help. and his face wrapped in a cloth. Jesus says to them, “Loose him and let him go.”Would you have wanted to be the first one to start untying? I bet it was Martha. Notice that Jesus did not do what they could do; removing the stone and unwrapping Lazarus was up to them.
